item.title: [Python] [#2] Make Minecraft with Python. -Model drawing and player implementation-
item.description: <font color="grey">Part of pictures, articles, images on this page are copyrighted by Mojang AB.</font> #Overview This project reproduces the world-famous sandbox game “Minecraft” in the programming language “Python”. ** Previous article: [[1] Making Minecraft with Python.-Survey and design-]** ** Next article: [[3] Making Minecraft with Python. ~Improvement of player’s movement (concept of inertia) and collision detection ~) ** #Introduction Thank you very much for your patience. It’s the second bullet!
